resources:
FirebaseApp
Hi:
A sign in attempt requires further verification because we did not recognize your device. To complete the sign in, enter the verification code on the unrecognized device.
Verification code:
If you did not attempt to sign in to your account, your password may be compromised. Create a new, strong password your Firebase account.
If you\'d like to automatically verify devices in the future, consider enabling two-factor authentication on your account.
If you decide to enable two-factor authentication, ensure you retain access to one or more account recovery methods.
Thanks, The Edmac Team
See what\'s happening in the world right now. Log in Create account OR Cancel
Welcome Email address Password Forgot password? We are happy to see you again. Sign in with your Firebase ID
Next Create an account to connect with friends, family and communities of people who share your interest. Join Firebase What\'s your email? Enter the email where you can be contacted. No one will be able to see this. Name What\'s your name Enter your real name. At least 6 characters Minimum 1 number Minimum 1 uppercase Minimum 1 symbol Minimum 1 lowercase letter I agree with the Terms and Conditions. I agree with the Privacy Policy. What\'s your birthday your date of birth will not be shown publicly. Create a password Your password must have at least: 8 characters (20 max), 1 capital letter, 1 number and a special character (such as: # ? ! $ % @). Agree to Firebase\'s terms and policies Sign up Get started Creating your account... I agree //RegisterActivity Please enter a valid email address. Please enter your name. You seem to be entering the wrong information. Please enter your true date of birth. Years old Year old Choose your date of birth. The code was sent
By tapping I agree, you agree to create an account and to Firebase\'s Terms, Privacy Policy and Cookies Policy. \n\nThe Privacy Policy describes the ways we can use the information we collect when you create an account. For example, we use this information to provide, personalize and improve our products, including ads.
